name: The Original Smudg G'Luv
overview:
FOR SMUDGELESS TOUCHSCREEN OPERATION - used for preventing smudges to all touch screen devices. Smudgless glove for Electronic Devices.

Our goal is to provide the tech industry with a new accessory line to use with different electronic device screens sold in the retail industry. For smart phones and touchscreen computers. Not only does it prevent smudging, our product can also be used a means to reduce germ contact when using any public keypad such as restaurants, grocery stores, gas stations even the bank atm’s. Great for Casino slot machine users, helps reduce germ contact caused by other users.

The Smudg G’Luv is the first of it’s kind and is intended to be used as a two fingered, snug fitting glove for applying hand navigation or finger tip operation on all electronic device screens. Its main use is to prevent smudging to the screen keeping it virtually clean for smudgeless touch screen operation. This product can be used on GPS devices (auto and hand held), all smart phones, and touchscreen computers.

Manufactured with the highest quality fabric it has been proven and tested. The Smudg G’Luv is fashionable, expandable, durable and is designed for extended use and comfort. Machine washable.

If interested in sales or distribution please visit our website at www.smudggluv.com
